label: A4B_tI10_139_de_a-001
title: $D1_{3}$ (BaAl$_{4}$) Structure
comments:
BaAl$_{4}$ is the parent structure of a number of ternary compounds (Shatruk, 2019): 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B2C_tI10_139_d_e_a-003}{ThCr$_{2}$Si$_{2}$}, space group $I4/mmm$ \#139, with $c/a < 3$. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B2C_tI10_139_d_e_a-002}{TlCo$_{2}$S$_{2}$}, also in space group $I4/mmm$ \#139 but with $c/a > 3$. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC2_tP10_129_ac_c_bc-001}{CaBe$_{2}$Ge$_{2}$}, space group $P4/nmm$ \#129. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_tI10_107_a_a_ab-001}{BaNiSn$_{3}$}, space group $I4mm$ \#107.
